about_the_game:
This is just another free to play first person shooter game on Steam which there are plenty of already. The basic idea is that if you kill another player you teleport to their location. Maybe that idea needs a bit of polishing but I rely on your feedback.

Project: Swap is just a game that I made because I wanted to. This game is nothing special and I just want to focus on having fun developing it. Also I want you the players to

Features that I might consider adding

  • Character customization
  • New weapons (Some sort of laser rifle)
  • New maps
  • 3p animation rework
detailed_description:
This is just another free to play first person shooter game on Steam which there are plenty of already. The basic idea is that if you kill another player you teleport to their location. Maybe that idea needs a bit of polishing but I rely on your feedback.

Project: Swap is just a game that I made because I wanted to. This game is nothing special and I just want to focus on having fun developing it. Also I want you the players to

name: Project: Swap

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050ti
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 8400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060ti
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Project: Swap is just a simple, casual, non-competetive 1st person shooter that you can play with your friends. Find sessions or host them for your friends to join via steam. When you kill a person you teleport. Thats the basic idea of the game.
